#!/usr/bin/env python.description: Adds shebang line for default python interpreter.

#!/usr/bin/env python3.description: Adds shebang line for default python 3 interpreter.

# -*- coding=utf-8 -*-.description: set default python2.x encoding specification to utf-8 as it is mentioned in pep-0263.

# coding=utf-8.description: Set default python3 encoding specification to utf-8, by default this is the encoding for python3.x as it is mentioned in pep-3120.

body: from __future__ import absolute_import, division, print_function, unicode_literals
from future import ....description: Import future statement definitions for python2.x scripts using utf-8 as encoding.

body: from __future__ import absolute_import, division, print_function, unicode_literals
from future import ... v1.description: Import future statement definitions for python3.x scripts using utf-8 as encoding.

from ... import ....description: Import statement that allows individual objects from the module to be imported directly into the callerâ€™s symbol table.
